data.text: @SleepyAddicts Yeah and more is coming. They have a major system off the Northwest coast.
@SleepyAddicts We got some ice down here in Hackett Arkansas where I live but it melted away. It's a lot colder in international Falls Minnesota.

@SleepyAddicts It was bad. Keep an eye on the weather channel because there is more winter weather coming. A major ice storm is in progress from Texas to Virginia. Austin Texas area is getting it really bad and it's tracking Northeast.

@SleepyAddicts It makes you wonder. I know one you can check out. A 75 to 100 vehicle pile up on Interstate 35 that happened in Fort Worth Texas early this morning. Atleast 5 people were killed and many other people were injured or still trapped in their vehicles.
